message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. A fair offer for us both to benefit from the full amount.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. We both get a good amount, and we can avoid the inflation risk.
Bob, my turn. I understand your point about fairness. How about we switch it up? I'll take $55, you take $45. We can finalize this before inflation eats away more.
